text: St. Vincent de Paul (24 April 1581 â€“ 27 September 1660) was a French Roman Catholic priest who dedicated himself to serving the poor. He is venerated as a saint in the Catholic Church and the Anglican Communion. He was canonized in 1737. He was renowned for his compassion, humility and generosity and is known as the "Great Apostle of Trumpets." Category:1581 births Category:1660 deaths
title: Vincent de Paul
